news_header: Two children were rescued from a car on railway tracks just before a train collided with the vehicle in California.
news_text: In Redlands, California, two children were saved from a car stuck on railway tracks moments before an oncoming train struck the vehicle. The incident was captured on camera, showing the female driver and off-duty Sheriff deputy Michael Castaneda rushing to carry the children to safety. Meanwhile, other news includes a fire in a ballot drop box, a celebrity's surprise appearance, and ongoing political campaigns across the US.
